Description: Tiraz fragment woven in undyed, yellow and red silk, decorated with two lines of pseudo-Kufic inscriptions and two large friezes of stylised vegetal interlacing and stylised animal motifs in medallions. Warp: silk, undyed, S, 16/cm Weft: silk, undyed, yellow and red, I, 48 to 80/cm
Acquisition name: Donated by: Maj William Joseph Myers (executors of)
